naslov: **Prodaja Moderne Novogradnje pored Samobora - Visoki Roh Bau** (prodaja)
opis: Otkrijte savršen spoj modernog dizajna u ovoj jedinstvenoj luksuznoj kući posebne arhitekture smještenoj u mirnom okolini nadomak Zagreba. Na 4 km od Samobora ova novogradnja pruža slobodan prostor za sve vaše potrebe uz prostranu ukupnu stambenu površinu od 200 kvadratnih metara. Ovaj elegantni dom raspolaže s tri spavaće sobe i dvije moderne kupaonice. Uživajte u dvokatnoj strukturi koja nudi udoban raspored idealan za život s obitelji ili priliku za investiciju. Podno grijanje i dizalica topline će osiguravati ugodnu atmosferu tijekom cijele godine. Nekretnina se prostire na parceli veličine 429 kvadratnih metara. Betonska konstrukcija s termo fasadom pridonosi solidnosti i efikasnosti. Kuća je trenutno u visokoj roh bau fazi, unutrašnjost je dovedena do faze prije završnih obrtničkih radova pružajući vam priliku da završite interijer po vlastitom ukusu. Ključne značajke uključuju prostrane terase s dvije strane kuće osigurane aluminijskom ogradom, visoko kvalitetnu vanjsku PVC stolariju, el. rolete, komarnike, protuprovalna vrata za dodatnu sigurnost, garažu s jednim natkrivenim parkirnim mjestom te okućnicu u kojoj ćete uživati u opuštajućim trenucima na svježem zraku. Lokacija blizu autoputa omogućuje brzu povezanost s urbanim središtima. Uživajte u otvorenom pogledu na okolnu prirodu daleko od gradske pretrpanosti. Sada je vrijeme da postanete vlasnik ovog izvanrednog doma! Nazovite s povjerenjem. +385 91 618 6417 +385 1 2304 188 RE/MAX Commercial Hondlova 2/9 Zagreb Discover the perfect blend of modern design in this unique luxury house of special architecture located in a peaceful environment near Zagreb. 4 km from Samobor, this new construction offers free space for all your needs with a spacious total living area of 200 square meters. This stylish home has three bedrooms and two modern bathrooms. Enjoy the two-story structure that offers a comfortable layout ideal for living with a family or an investment opportunity. Underfloor heating and a heat pump will ensure a pleasant atmosphere all year round. The property is spread over a plot of 429 square meters. The concrete structure with a thermal facade contributes to solidity and efficiency. The house is currently in a high roh bau phase, the interior has been brought to the stage before the final craftsman works, giving you the opportunity to finish the interior to your own taste. Key features include spacious terraces on two sides of the house secured by an aluminum fence, high-quality external PVC joinery, el. roller shutters, mosquito nets, security doors for added security, a garage with one covered parking space and a garden where you can enjoy relaxing moments in the fresh air. The location near the highway allows for quick connections to urban centers. Enjoy the open view of the surrounding nature far from the city congestion. Now is the time to become the owner of this extraordinary home! Call with confidence.
